text: For a Friend (Pro kamaráda) is a 1940 Czechoslovak drama film, directed by Miroslav Cikán. It stars Theodor Pistek, Ladislav Boháč, and Jaroslav Vojta. ==References== ==External links== *For a Friend at the Internet Movie Database Category:1940 films Category:Czechoslovak films Category:Czechoslovak drama films Category:1940 drama films Category:Films directed by Miroslav Cikán Category:Czech films Category:Czechoslovak black-and-white films
title: For a Friend (film)
